item.description:
Traveling into Inner Space; It's not Rocket Science


Speaker: Allan Hughes, D.C.
You've heard him online. Now meet him in person.

Not everyone can travel into outer space, but traveling into inner space has always been a core practice of mysticism. When the chatter of the mind is stilled, in the deep silence of meditation, the secrets of the universe reveal themselves.

West Newton, Massachusetts
Saturday, April 26, 10am to noon
Scandinavian Living Center
206 Waltham, Street

Free onstreet parking--please do not park in driveway. It's reserved for residents. For more information and directions: click here.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the person doing the intro.
item.why: Join Allan as he explores the heart of mysticism and shows you how the mystic experiences people had thousands of years ago are as available to you today as they were then.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Traveling into Inner Space: It's not Rocket Science
